name: Mind Climb
description:
Mind Climb is a personified and stylised look into the struggle against mental illness through the unification and acceptance of our emotions.

It was made for the LD47 game jam in under 3 days with the help of Anthracite Gaming on Music.

The theme was "Stuck in a loop"; we're all stuck in a loop fighting against ourselves.

NOTE!! The Web & Comp builds broke due to a bug in the unity editor & will not progress upon unlocking the green frog. If you'd like to play the full game (there is MUCH more content), download the 1.1 exe! Thank you!
